name: Bactoriam
description:
Description:
You play with Bactoriam, the king of Bacteria. Bactoriam wants to prove that bacteria is not the minimum bare living organism. They are also better than Viruses which humans are afraid of them.

This Game was made for GameCOG explosion competition & 2BeeGames Compo & Experimental Games Compo.

Controls: The game is only with the mouse.

  • Right Mouse Click: move bactoriam toward the mouse cursor
  • Left Mouse Down: Charge bubbles to shoot
  • Left Mouse Release: Release the charged bubble
  • Middle Mouse Click/Spacebar: Super Shockwave
